---
title: "Intro to Data Science for Biology"
---

```{r demoplot, fig.align='center', echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data=iris, aes(x=Petal.Length, y=Petal.Width, color=Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw(base_size=14) +
  stat_smooth(method="lm")
```
